EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how BlueWaveX will expand your horizons!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're invited to the kickoff of the BlueWaveX Speaker Series tomorrow!
Session 1: BlueWaveXStudyAbroad As you've seen from the Outlook invite teaser, Professor Marsch will be presenting on how your role at BlueWave could bring you to far off magical lands like South Africa, Charlotte/Charleston, and Newport Beach!
In case you needed any more temptation, please see details below on this presentation and the BlueWaveX series in general.
What: BlueWave wants to encourage teambuilding and global mindsets, to this end Prof. Marsch will be presenting a new opportunity for employees to spend time working in our remote offices. When: Thursday, April 5th, 2018 from 12:00-1:00pm (AKA lunch will be served!) Where (physical): Clarendon Conference Room, with overflow streaming coverage in Dartmouth Where (virtual): +1(857)327-8594 or Join online meeting
If you haven't already, RSVP here!
What's the BlueWaveX Speaker Series? Dean S. Thompson is kicking off an engaging & educational series known as BlueWaveX to keep all of us sharp on our industry & BlueWave knowledge.
Have session ideas? Submit them to the Dean.
Why Attend this Series?
Engaging Content - Learn how solar interconnects (hehe) with the global energy and business landscape. Incredible Speakers - BlueWavers & our guests will wow you with their presentations. No Exams - Stress-free learning environment! Good Food - Almost always. Good Feelings! Learning makes your brain stronger & healthier, and fights aging (maybe).
We hope you join us!
- BWC3
